summary:
Dawnstar Sanctuary remake mod.
Added enchanting workbench,blacksmith workshop,more container,more lights and Merchant.
descriptionHtml:
Dark brotherhood Dawnstar Sanctuary remake mod.
Added enchanting workbench,blacksmith workshop,more container,more lights and Merchant.

Speak to Delvin Mallory(Where You Hang Your Enemy\'s Head...),purchase the upgrades.
After select \"Poisoner\'s Nook\" and \"Master Bedroom\",it is changed.

Cleaned up dirty edits by TES5Edit.


*** ADD ***

- enchanting workbench
- blacksmith workshop
 - workbench
 - tanning rack
 - grindstone
 - Anvil
 - smelter
- Wood Chopping Block
- 28 containers
- 6 Weapon Racks
- shrine of Arkay
- 2 Beds
- Merchant (merchandise : Fences,General),he has 10000 gold
- lights


*** DELETE ***

- delete some mists
- many items scattered all over the floor cleaned-up


*** Notice ***
You can use this mod freely.
But if you make modification and upload it, please credit me.
Even if something bad occurs by putting in this Mod, I do not take responsibility. 


This is my first time upload a mod, hope you enjoy!
My English is not very good.I thank you for reading it through.


By Amean
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32223
author: Amean
